metadata.title: USN-6375-1 -- atftp vulnerability
metadata.description: Florian Fainelli discovered that atftp did not properly manage requests made to a non-existent file, which could lead to a crash. A remote  attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6375-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  atftp - 0.7.git20210915-4build1 atftpd - 0.7.git20210915-4build1 No subscription required
